text: Rodrigo Maranhão (born December 11, 1992) is a Brazilian football player for Lampang in Thai League 2. ==Career== After some experiences between Brazil and Thailand, Rodrigo Maranhão opted to sign for Zweigen Kanazawa in December 2017.http://www.zweigen- kanazawa.jp/Contents/news/%E3%83%9E%E3%83%A9%E3%83%8B%E3%83%A7%E3%83%B3-%E9%81%B8%E6%89%8B%e3%80%80-%E3%82%B9%E3%82%B3%E3%83%BC%E3%82%BF%E3%82%A4fc%E3%82%88%E3%82%8A%E5%AE%8C%E5%85%A8%E7%A7%BB%E7%B1%8D%E5%8A%A0%E5%85%A5/ ==Club statistics== Updated to 28 August 2018.Nippon Sports Kikaku Publishing inc./日本スポーツ企画出版社, "J1&J2;&J3;選手名鑑ハンディ版 2018 (NSK MOOK)", 7 February 2018, Japan, (p. 221 out of 289) {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- ! colspan=3 | Club performance ! colspan=2 | League ! colspan=2 | Cup ! colspan=2 | Total |- !
